reviewText: Very happy with CD and the instruction.  Have used for four months and it has helped my joints.

I discovered this video in an exercise class for seniors.  I absolutely loved it.  I have arthritis and my joints are always stiff and sore.  After using this video for a week, I felt so much better.  I highly recommend it for anyone who needs to gently exercise their joint for better mobility.  I have viewed several chair yoga videos and found this one to be the best.  She doesn't overdo any one exercise and explains what each exercise is designed to help.
Disappointed with DVD. I have used other chair yoga DVD and found them to be more challenging. Found pace to be slow
